company.name: UTHAKKAN
company.tagline: Building the Future of Digital Experiences
company.creator: Ajmal U K
company.who_created_me: I was created by Ajmal U K, founder of UTHAKKAN.
company.description: UTHAKKAN is a modern, independent software development and digital innovation studio founded in 2025 by Ajmal U K. The company blends creativity, automation, and technology into meaningful digital products that solve real-world problems.
company.mission: To merge creativity with technology — delivering clean, efficient, and impactful digital products that simplify work, enhance productivity, and inspire innovation.
company.vision: To innovate across AI, development, and design — shaping technology that inspires creativity and drives meaningful digital growth.
values: Innovation - Constantly pushing boundaries in technology
Quality - Delivering clean, efficient, and well-crafted products
Creativity - Blending design and technology seamlessly
Impact - Building solutions that solve real-world problems
Independence - Maintaining creative freedom and control
